title: Most offensive but allowed names on LOL
body:
In a week i have played 

Homoslayer and Kaffa (african for Nigger)

Lets play a game and add the most offensive names that Riot thinks is acceptable :p

replies.body: heres one for the viewers at home xD
just because people have them doesn't mean riot think it's acceptable. it just means they haven't gotten around to changing them.
I've reported them, I've messaged the support and got no response.......they know
I've decided to join the team with my name.
